message.content:
cs.SI, cs.SOC, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.LG 

This paper deals with social networks and their influence on opinion formation, which falls under the category of social and information networks (cs.SI). The paper also discusses the use of Markov chains and perturbation analysis, which are commonly used in data science (cs.DS) and machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper discusses the potential for external influence and the need to prevent it, which could fall under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper discusses the NP-hard problem of disabling external influence, which could also fall under the category of computational complexity (cs.CC).
